title: Porsha Williams holds daughter Pilar as she joins RHOA co-stars at A3C Conference in Atlanta
text:
In addition to starring in the Real Housewives of Atlanta, Porsha Williams has also ventured into hair extensions and bedding.

The TV personality spoke about her business experience Thursday in an entertainment and entrepreneurship panel at the A3C Conference in Atlanta.

She was joined by some of her RHOA co-stars at the event, as well as her adorable daughter Pilar.

Cool mom: Porsha Williams was joined by some of her RHOA co-stars Thursday at the A3C Conference in Atlanta, as well as her adorable daughter Pilar

The 38-year-old served post-pregnancy body goals in a gorgeous red business chic ensemble.

Williams dazzled at the six-day conference in a red vest, which featured a short built-in cape.

She put on a busty display, sporting the piece over a matching red top, which showed plenty of cleavage.

Williams paired the look with a slim pair of matching red slacks, cut just above the ankle.

Lady in red: The 38-year-old served post-pregnancy body goals in a gorgeous red business chic ensemble

Hero vibes: Williams dazzled at the six-day conference in a red vest, which featured a short built-in cape

Stay gold: She completed the look with a pair of strappy red stilettos, featuring a gold print, gold chandelier earrings and a matching watch and bracelet

Squad goals: The Atlanta native was joined by her RHOA co-stars Tanya Sam, NeNe Leakes, Cynthia Bailey and hip hop artist Rasheeda Frost

Boss ladies: They discussed their business savvy approach and how they've leveraged their celebrity to become successful entrepreneurs

She completed the look with a pair of strappy red stilettos, featuring a gold print, gold chandelier earrings and a matching watch and bracelet.

The Atlanta native was joined by her RHOA co-stars Tanya Sam, NeNe Leakes, Cynthia Bailey and hip hop artist Rasheeda Frost.

They discussed their business savvy approach and how they've leveraged their celebrity to become successful entrepreneurs.

Photo op: The ladies posed backstage following the panel

Stage presence: Williams also took to social media with a group photo and some video from the stage after wrapping up their chat

Successful event: She panned over to her co-stars who had a blast at the event

The ladies posed backstage following the panel, as Williams held seven-month-old daughter Pilar.

She also took to social media with a group photo and some video from the stage after wrapping up their chat.

Williams gave birth to Pilar in March, shortly before calling off her eight-month engagement to Dennis McKinley in June, which they later rekindled in August.
description: Williams was joined by Tanya Sam, NeNe Leakes, Cynthia Bailey and Rasheeda Frost to discussed how they've leveraged their celebrity to become successful entrepreneurs.
